titles.title: Expressing the need for enhanced public awareness of Huntington's Disease and support for the designation of a "National Huntington's Disease Awareness Month".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the designation of National Huntington's Disease Awareness Month.
